word_mean: 毛细血管：连接小动脉和小静脉的细管，在几乎所有身体各部分形成血管网。毛血细管的管壁如半透膜，可交换各种物质，包括在血液与组织液之间的体液交换
毛细血管床：浅色部分表示已氧合血液

sentence.Network_en: Rapid capillary proliferation is a prominent feature of all early wound healing.
sentence.Network_cn: 迅速的毛细血管增生是所有早期伤口愈合的一个突出表现.

sentence.Network_en: The gasoline detection system consists of a capillary restriction.
sentence.Network_cn: 汽油检测系统由毛细管节流器组成.

sentence.Network_en: Imbibition is thus displacement due only to capillary forces.
sentence.Network_cn: 于是,吸吮是仅仅依靠毛细力的一种驱替.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 专家您好,我是Agilent公司LC-MSD色质联用仪的用户,在质谱仪里面有一根石英(玻璃)毛细管柱(Capillary)非常脆弱,拔出时不慎折断。,专家咨询,讲座与咨询,仪器论坛

list.abs: 教育论坛 ... capillary phenomenon, 毛细现象 capillary viscometer, 毛细管粘度计 capsule, 膜盒.
毛细血管瘤（capillary hemangioma）多见于婴儿时期， 又名婴儿型血管瘤（infantile hemangioma），多发生于皮肤和皮下组织，好 …
毛细管电泳（Capillary electrophoresis）利用毛细管中被分析的带电分子在电场作用下，因移动速率不同而达到分离不同分子的目的。
2008-10-18 -- 工业控制英语词汇大全 ... Calibration,instrument 设备校准 Capillary action 毛细管作用 Carrier fluid 载液.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin capillaris, from capillus 'hair', influenced by Old French capillaire

entry.def: Capillaries are tiny blood vessels in your body.

means.word_mean: 1. a tube of small internal diameter; holds liquid by capillary action
2. any of the minute blood vessels connecting arterioles with venules
2. long and slender with a very small internal diameter;

auth_sentence.content: Felt-tip pens work by capillary action, so I could write upside-down.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Felt-tip pens work by capillary action, so I could write upside-down.

auth_sentence.content: The heat drew moisture out of the apparently dry underlaying sandy desert soil via capillary action.
auth_sentence.res_content: The heat drew moisture out of the apparently dry underlaying sandy desert soil via capillary action.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The heat drew moisture out of the apparently dry underlaying sandy desert soil via capillary action.

auth_sentence.content: Capillary action wicks water to the algae, and ducts bring in the hot flue gas.

sentences.en: The blood flows from the capillaries back into the veins.
sentences.cn: 血从毛细血管流回静脉。
